name: Instance Table
description:
Use the action tag @INSTANCETABLE=form_name in a descriptive text field to include a table showing data from repeat instances of that form.
If project is longitudinal, use @INSTANCETABLE=event_name:form_name to specify the event and form (can be a repeating form or a form in a repeating event).
Other action tags are available for controlling cetain properties of te tables and their contents.

action-tags.description: Tag @INSTANCETABLE=form_name in a descriptive text field to include a table showing data from repeat instances of that form.
Ignore this field in instance all tables.
Tag @INSTANCETABLE_LABEL='column header': Provide an alternative column title for the field in all instance tables.
Suppress the "+ Add New" button on data entry forms.
Hide the '#' column containing instance numbers.

Use, for example, @INSTANCETABLE_VARLIST=rptfrmvar3,rptfrmvar1,rptfrmvar6,rptfrm_complete to include only the variables from the repeating form that appear in the comma-separated list. Also sets the order of columns in the table rather (default is the order of fields from the form).
Override default choices for page sizing: specify integer default page size, or -1 for 'All'

Where you have an instance table on a repeating form that is referencing another repeating form, use @INSTANCETABLE_REF=fieldname to have the instances filtered to show only those where the current instance number is saved in a field on the referenced repeating form. For example, an instance table in a repeating 'Visit' form may be configured to show only instances of the repeating 'Medication' form where the current Visit instance is selected in the visitref field on the Medication form: @INSTANCETABLE @INSTANCETABLE_REF=visitref.
Use @INSTANCETABLE_FILTER='[v]=1' to specify a logic expression to show only instances that match the filter expression.
Use @INSTANCETABLE_ADDBTNLABEL='Button Label' to specify an alternative label for the "Add New Instance" button ("New Medication", "Add new instance" etc.).
Use @INSTANCETABLE_HIDECHOICEVALUES to suppress the display of choice field values and show only choice labels.
